trans-unit.source: Represents a claim for a <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken" /> security token that asserts that an authorization decision regarding access by the subject to the specified resource has been made.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 리소스에 대한 주체의 액세스와 관련된 권한 부여 결정을 내렸음을 어설션하는 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken" /> 보안 토큰의 클레임을 나타냅니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken> security tokens specify their claims using SAML assertions, which can specify whether a subject is authorized to access a specific resource.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken> 보안 토큰은 특정 리소스에 액세스할 권한이 주체에게 부여되는지 여부를 지정할 수 있는 SAML 어설션을 사용하여 클레임을 지정합니다.

trans-unit.source: The claims in a SAML assertion are represented by SAML statements.
trans-unit.target: SAML 어설션의 클레임은 SAML 설명으로 표현됩니다.

trans-unit.source: The SAML specification defines a set of SAML statement types and one of them is a <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement>.
trans-unit.target: SAML 사양에서는 일련의 SAML 설명 형식을 정의하며 그 중 하나가 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement>입니다.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement> asserts an authorization decision regarding access by the subject to the specified resource has been made.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement>는 지정된 리소스에 대한 주체의 액세스와 관련된 권한 부여 결정을 내렸음을 어설션합니다.

trans-unit.source: The following table summarizes the properties that are associated with the authorization decision.
trans-unit.target: 다음 표에는 권한 부여 결정과 연결된 속성이 요약되어 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Property
Description
The authorization decision rendered by the SAML authority with respect to the resource represented by the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.Resource%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.Resource%2A> 속성이 나타내는 리소스와 관련하여 SAML 기관이 내린 권한 부여 결정입니다.

trans-unit.source: A set of SAML assertions that the SAML authority relied on to render the decision.
trans-unit.target: SAML 기관이 결정을 내리는 데 사용한 SAML 어설션의 집합입니다.

trans-unit.source: A URI reference that identifies the resource to which access is sought.
The set of actions that the subject is authorized to perform on the resource represented by the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.Resource%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.Resource%2A> 속성이 나타내는 리소스에서 수행할 수 있도록 주체에게 권한이 부여된 작업의 집합입니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement" /> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement" /> class.

This constructor initializes the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.IsReadOnly%2A> property to `false` and the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.ClaimType%2A> property to `http://schemas.microsoft.com/mb/2005/09/ClaimType/SamlAuthorizationDecision`.
trans-unit.target: 이 생성자는 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.IsReadOnly%2A> 속성을 `false`로 초기화하고 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.ClaimType%2A> 속성을 `http://schemas.microsoft.com/mb/2005/09/ClaimType/SamlAuthorizationDecision`으로 초기화합니다.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSubject" /> that represents the subject of the claim.
Sets the <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSubjectStatement.SamlSubject" /> property.
A URI reference that identifies the resource to which access is sought.
Sets the <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.Resource" /> property.

A <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAccessDecision" /> that specifies the authorization decision rendered by the SAML authority with respect to access by the subject to the specified resource.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 리소스에 대한 주체의 액세스와 관련하여 SAML 기관이 내리는 권한 부여 결정을 지정하는 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAccessDecision" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: Sets the <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.AccessDecision" /> property.

An <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" /> of type <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAction" /> that specifies the set of actions that the subject is authorized to perform on the resource.
trans-unit.target: 리소스에서 수행할 수 있도록 주체에게 권한이 부여된 작업의 집합을 지정하는 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" /> 형식의 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAction" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: Sets the <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.SamlActions" /> property.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement" /> class.
using the specified subject, resource, authorization decision, and the actions sought by the subject on the resource.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 주체, 리소스, 권한 부여 결정 및 리소스에서 주체가 수행하려는 작업을 사용합니다.

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.IsReadOnly%2A> property to `false`, the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.ClaimType%2A> property to `http://schemas.microsoft.com/mb/2005/09/ClaimType/SamlAuthorizationDecision`, and the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.Evidence%2A> property to `null`.
trans-unit.target: 이 생성자는 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.IsReadOnly%2A> 속성을 `false`로 초기화하고 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.ClaimType%2A> 속성을 `http://schemas.microsoft.com/mb/2005/09/ClaimType/SamlAuthorizationDecision`으로 초기화하며 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.Evidence%2A> 속성을 `null`로 초기화합니다.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="samlActions" /> is <see langword="null" />.
-or-
<paramref name="samlActions" /> contains a member that is <see langword="null" />.
-or-
<paramref name="samlSubject" /> is <see langword="null" />.
<paramref name="authorityBindings" /> contains a member that is <see langword="null" />.
-or-
<paramref name="resource" /> is <see langword="null" /> or empty.
A <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSubject" /> that represents the subject of the claim.
Sets the <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSubjectStatement.SamlSubject" /> property.
A URI reference that identifies the resource to which access is sought.
Sets the <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.Resource" /> property.

A <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAccessDecision" /> that specifies the authorization decision rendered by the SAML authority with respect to access by the subject to the specified resource.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 리소스에 대한 주체의 액세스와 관련하여 SAML 기관이 내리는 권한 부여 결정을 지정하는 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAccessDecision" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: Sets the <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.AccessDecision" /> property.

An <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" /> of type <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAction" /> that specifies the set of actions that the subject is authorized to perform on the resource.
trans-unit.target: 리소스에서 수행할 수 있도록 주체에게 권한이 부여된 작업의 집합을 지정하는 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" /> 형식의 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAction" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: Sets the <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.SamlActions" /> property.
A <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlEvidence" /> that contains a set of SAML assertions that the SAML authority relied on to render the authorization decision.
trans-unit.target: SAML 기관이 권한 부여 결정을 내리는 데 사용한 SAML 어설션의 집합을 포함하는 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlEvidence" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: Sets the <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.Evidence" /> property.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement" /> class.
using the specified subject, resource, authorization decision, and the actions sought by the subject on the resource.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 주체, 리소스, 권한 부여 결정 및 리소스에서 주체가 수행하려는 작업을 사용합니다.

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.IsReadOnly%2A> property to `false`, the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.ClaimType%2A> property to `http://schemas.microsoft.com/mb/2005/09/ClaimType/SamlAuthorizationDecision`.
trans-unit.target: 이 생성자는 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.IsReadOnly%2A> 속성을 `false`로 초기화하고 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.ClaimType%2A> 속성을 `http://schemas.microsoft.com/mb/2005/09/ClaimType/SamlAuthorizationDecision`으로 초기화합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the authorization decision rendered by the SAML authority with respect to access by the subject to the specified resource.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 리소스에 대한 주체의 액세스와 관련하여 SAML 기관이 내리는 권한 부여 결정을 가져오거나 설정합니다.

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAccessDecision" /> values that specify the authorization decision rendered by the SAML authority with respect to access by the subject to the specified resource.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 리소스에 대한 주체의 액세스와 관련하여 SAML 기관이 내리는 권한 부여 결정을 지정하는 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAccessDecision" /> 값 중 하나입니다.

trans-unit.source: <list type="table"><listheader><term> Exception type
</term><description> Condition

</description></listheader><item><term><see cref="T:System.InvalidOperationException" /></term><description> The <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.AccessDecision" /> property is set and the <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.IsReadOnly" /> property is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: </description></listheader><item><term><see cref="T:System.InvalidOperationException" /></term><description> <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.AccessDecision" /> 속성을 설정 및 <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.IsReadOnly" /> 속성은 <see langword="true" />합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.AccessDecision%2A> property corresponds to the `Decision` attribute of the `<AuthorizationDecisionStatement>` element that is defined in the Assertions and Protocol for the OASIS Security Assertion Markup Language (SAML) specification.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.AccessDecision%2A> 속성은 OASIS SAML(Security Assertion Markup Language)의 어설션 및 프로토콜 사양에 정의된 `Decision` 요소의 `<AuthorizationDecisionStatement>` 특성에 해당합니다.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IList`1" /> of type <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Claims.Claim" /> that contains the set of claims to add to.
Adds claims based on the properties of this instance to the specified collection of claims.
trans-unit.target: 이 인스턴스의 속성을 기반으로 하는 클레임을 지정된 클레임 컬렉션에 추가합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.AddClaimsToList%28System.Collections.Generic.IList%7BSystem.IdentityModel.Claims.Claim%7D%29> method adds a claim to the `claims` parameter for each action specified in the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.SamlActions%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.AddClaimsToList%28System.Collections.Generic.IList%7BSystem.IdentityModel.Claims.Claim%7D%29> 메서드는 `claims` 속성에 지정된 각 작업에 대한 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.SamlActions%2A> 매개 변수에 클레임을 추가합니다.

trans-unit.source: Each claim that is added to the collection is based on the action, and the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.ClaimType%2A>, <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.Resource%2A>, and <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.AccessDecision%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 컬렉션에 추가된 각 클레임은 작업과 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.ClaimType%2A>, <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.Resource%2A> 및 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.AccessDecision%2A> 속성을 기반으로 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The claim resource type is <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionClaimResource>.
<paramref name="claims" /> is <see langword="null" />.
Gets the type of security claim.
The type of security claim.
Always <c>http://schemas.microsoft.com/mb/2005/09/ClaimType/SamlAuthorizationDecision</c>.
Gets or sets the evidence that the SAML authority relied on to render the authorization decision.
trans-unit.target: SAML 기관이 권한 부여 결정을 내리는 데 사용한 증거를 가져오거나 설정합니다.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlEvidence" /> that contains a set of SAML assertions that the SAML authority relied on to render the authorization decision.
trans-unit.target: SAML 기관이 권한 부여 결정을 내리는 데 사용한 SAML 어설션의 집합을 포함하는 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlEvidence" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.AccessDecision%2A> property corresponds to the `<Evidence>` element that is defined in the Assertions and Protocol for the OASIS Security Assertion Markup Language (SAML) specification.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.AccessDecision%2A> 속성은 OASIS SAML(Security Assertion Markup Language)의 어설션 및 프로토콜 사양에 정의된 `<Evidence>` 요소에 해당합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the properties of this instance are read-only.
trans-unit.target: 이 인스턴스의 속성이 읽기 전용인지 여부를 나타내는 값을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the properties of this instance are read-only; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 이 인스턴스의 속성이 읽기 전용이면 <see langword="true" />이고, 그렇지 않으면 <see langword="false" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.

To make this instance of the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement> class read-only, call the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.MakeReadOnly%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement> 클래스의 이 인스턴스를 읽기 전용으로 만들려면 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.MakeReadOnly%2A> 메서드를 호출합니다.

trans-unit.source: Causes this instance to be read-only.

When the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.MakeReadOnly%2A> method is called, the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.IsReadOnly%2A> property is set to `true` and properties of this instance can no longer be set.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.MakeReadOnly%2A> 메서드를 호출하면 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.IsReadOnly%2A> 속성이 `true`로 설정되고 이 인스턴스의 속성을 더 이상 설정할 수 없습니다.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReader" /> to read the SAML authorization statement.
trans-unit.target: SAML 권한 부여 설명을 읽을 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReader" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSerializer" /> that is capable of reading XML elements in the SAML authorization statement that is defined in the SAML specification.
trans-unit.target: SAML 사양에 정의된 SAML 권한 부여 설명에서 XML 요소를 읽을 수 있는 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSerializer" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer" /> that reads the <see langword="KeyInfo" /> clause of the digital signature.
Reads the SAML authorization statement from the specified XML reader.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 XML 판독기에서 SAML 권한 부여 설명을 읽습니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.ReadXml%28System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReader%2CSystem.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSerializer%2CSystem.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer%2CSystem.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver%29> method sets the following properties:
<paramref name="reader" /> is <see langword="null" />.
-or-
<paramref name="samlSerializer" /> is <see langword="null" />.
<paramref name="reader" /> refers to an XML element that does not contain the <see langword="Resource" /> and <see langword="Decision" /> attributes.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="reader" />가 <see langword="Resource" /> 및 <see langword="Decision" /> 특성을 포함하지 않는 XML 요소를 참조하는 경우

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="reader" /> refers to an XML element that does not have <see langword="<saml:Subject>" />, <see langword="<saml:Evidence>" />, and <see langword="<saml:Action>" /> child elements.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="reader" />가 <see langword="<saml:Subject>" />, <see langword="<saml:Evidence>" /> 및 <see langword="<saml:Action>" /> 자식 요소를 포함하지 않는 XML 요소를 참조하는 경우

trans-unit.source: The resource to which access is sought by the subject of the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken" /> security token.
A URI reference that identifies the resource to which access is sought.

The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.AccessDecision%2A> property corresponds to the `Decision` attribute of the `<AuthorizationDecisionStatement>` element that is defined in the Assertions and Protocol for the OASIS Security Assertion Markup Language (SAML) specification.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.AccessDecision%2A> 속성은 OASIS SAML(Security Assertion Markup Language)의 어설션 및 프로토콜 사양에 정의된 `Decision` 요소의 `<AuthorizationDecisionStatement>` 특성에 해당합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the set of actions that the subject is authorized to perform on the resource.
trans-unit.target: 리소스에서 수행할 수 있도록 주체에게 권한이 부여된 작업의 집합을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IList`1" /> of type <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAction" /> that specifies the set of actions that the subject is authorized to perform on the resource.
trans-unit.target: 리소스에서 수행할 수 있도록 주체에게 권한이 부여된 작업의 집합을 지정하는 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IList`1" /> 형식의 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAction" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.SamlActions%2A> property corresponds to the `<Action>` element that is defined in the Assertions and Protocol for the OASIS Security Assertion Markup Language (SAML) specification.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.SamlActions%2A> 속성은 OASIS SAML(Security Assertion Markup Language)의 어설션 및 프로토콜 사양에 정의된 `<Action>` 요소에 해당합니다.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryWriter" /> to write the SAML authorization statement.
trans-unit.target: SAML 권한 부여 설명을 쓸 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryWriter" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSerializer" /> that is capable of writing XML elements in a SAML assertion.
trans-unit.target: SAML 어설션에 XML 요소를 쓸 수 있는 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSerializer" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer" /> that is capable of writing <see langword="KeyInfo" /> clauses.
Writes the SAML authorization statement into the specified XML serializer.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 XML serializer에 SAML 권한 부여 설명을 씁니다.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.WriteXml%28System.Xml.XmlDictionaryWriter%2CSystem.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSerializer%2CSystem.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer%29> method to write the current <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement> instance into a `<AuthorizationDecisionStatement>` element.
trans-unit.target: 현재 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement.WriteXml%28System.Xml.XmlDictionaryWriter%2CSystem.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSerializer%2CSystem.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer%29> 인스턴스를 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement> 요소에 쓰려면 `<AuthorizationDecisionStatement>` 메서드를 사용합니다.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="writer" /> is <see langword="null" />.
-or-
<paramref name="samlSerializer" /> is <see langword="null" />.
